016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapischema;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.builders.With;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.hyperschema.HyperSchema;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.JsonApiRels;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.Definitions;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.JsonSchema;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.Properties;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.Types;
025
026import java.util.ArrayList;
027import java.util.List;
028
029public record ResourceDocumentSchema(HyperSchema schema) {
030
031    private static final String HASH_DEF = "#/definitions/";
032
033    private static JsonSchema resourceObjectIdentifier = new JsonSchema.Builder()
034            .type(Types.Object)
035            .additionalProperties(false)
036            .required("data")
037            .properties(new Properties.Builder().property("data", new JsonSchema.Builder()
038                    .type(Types.Object)
039                    .additionalProperties(false)
040                    .required("id", "type")
041                    .properties(new Properties.Builder()
042                            .property("id", new JsonSchema.Builder().type(Types.String).build())
043                            .property("type", new JsonSchema.Builder().type(Types.String).build())
044                            .build())
045                    .build()).build())
046            .build();
047
048    public static JsonSchema resourceObjectIdentifierRef = new JsonSchema.Builder()
049            .ref("#/definitions/resourceobjectidentifier")
050            .build();
051
052    private static JsonSchema relationshipRelatedLinks = new JsonSchema.Builder()
053            .type(Types.Object)
054            .additionalProperties(false)
055            .properties(new Properties.Builder()
056                    .property("links", new JsonSchema.Builder()
057                            .additionalProperties(false)
058                            .properties(new Properties.Builder()
059                                    .property(JsonApiRels.related, new JsonSchema.Builder().type(Types.String).build())
060                                    .build())
061                            .build())
062                    .build())
063            .build();
064
065    public static JsonSchema relationshipRelatedLinksRef = new JsonSchema.Builder()
066            .ref("#/definitions/relationshiprelatedlinks")
067            .build();
068
069    public record Builder(HyperSchema.Builder builder,
070                          Definitions.Builder definitions,
071                          Properties.Builder properties)
072            implements With<Builder> {
073        public Builder() {
074            this(new HyperSchema.Builder(new JsonSchema.Builder()),
075                    new Definitions.Builder(),
076                    new Properties.Builder());
077            builder.builder()
078                    .type(Types.Object);
079
080            definitions.definition("resourceobjectidentifier", resourceObjectIdentifier);
081            definitions.definition("relationshiprelatedlinks", relationshipRelatedLinks);
082        }
083
084        public Builder resource(ResourceObjectSchema resourceObjectSchema) {
085            resourceObjectSchema.schema().schema().getProperties()
086                    .getPropertyByName("type")
087                    .flatMap(JsonSchema::getConstant).ifPresent(type ->
088                    {
089                        definitions.definition(type, resourceObjectSchema.schema().schema());
090                        properties.property("data", new JsonSchema.Builder().ref(HASH_DEF + type).build());
091                    });
092            return this;
093        }
094
095        public Builder resources(ResourceObjectSchema... resourceObjectSchemas) {
096            List<JsonSchema> refs = new ArrayList<>();
097            for (ResourceObjectSchema resourceObjectSchema : resourceObjectSchemas) {
098                resourceObjectSchema.schema().schema().getProperties()
099                        .getPropertyByName("type")
100                        .flatMap(JsonSchema::getConstant).ifPresent(type ->
101                        {
102                            definitions.definition(type, resourceObjectSchema.schema().schema());
103                            refs.add(new JsonSchema.Builder().ref(HASH_DEF + type).build());
104                        });
105            }
106
107            properties.property("data", new JsonSchema.Builder()
108                    .type(Types.Array)
109                    .items(refs)
110                    .build());
111
112            return this;
113        }
114
115        public Builder included(ResourceObjectSchema... resourceObjectSchemas) {
116            List<JsonSchema> refs = new ArrayList<>();
117            for (ResourceObjectSchema resourceObjectSchema : resourceObjectSchemas) {
118                resourceObjectSchema.schema().schema().getProperties()
119                        .getPropertyByName("type")
120                        .flatMap(JsonSchema::getConstant).ifPresent(type ->
121                        {
122                            definitions.definition(type, resourceObjectSchema.schema().schema());
123                            refs.add(new JsonSchema.Builder().ref(HASH_DEF + type).build());
124                        });
125            }
126
127            properties.property("included", new JsonSchema.Builder()
128                    .type(Types.Array)
129                    .items(refs)
130                    .build());
131
132            return this;
133        }
134
135        public ResourceDocumentSchema build() {
136            builder.builder()
137                    .definitions(definitions.build())
138                    .properties(properties.build());
139
140            return new ResourceDocumentSchema(builder.build());
141        }
142    }
143}
